name: Editable Filtering Table
description: This widget is storing table which you filter data for and add items. You can edit items by double clicking on the cell. Add a table.onCellUpdate(row, column, value) handler to detect cell updates.

auto.description: Whether to create programmatically or from a template.

value.description: An object containing a object of colums and array of row arrays to be added to the table.
